title: candravadani sundaravENi
sahitya:
candravadani sundaravENi cAmuNDEshvari krupAkari


anupallavi

  indrAdi sannuta ambuja lOcani himAdri nandini hamsini


caraNam    mamava mahAdevi mangaLakAriNi mahiSAsura mardhani pApanAshini
pAmarajana pAlini bharaNi pOSiNi mahEshvara manOllAsini mAlini
